src_original: munau bruvāñe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu /
tgt_original: munau bruvāṇe'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu |

src_original: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
tgt_original: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ ||1 ||

src_original: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākas tayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /
tgt_original: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ |

src_original: nācintayad vaiśrmaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tasthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam // Saund_4.2 //
tgt_original: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam ||2 ||

src_original: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /  dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yato babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3 //
tgt_original: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti |  dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā ||3 ||

src_original: sā hāsahaṃsā nayandvirephā pīnastanātyunnatapadmakośā /  bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
tgt_original: sā hāsahaṃsā nayanadvirephā pīnastanātyunnatapadmakośā |  bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa ||4 ||

src_original: rūpeṇa cātyantamanohareṇa rūpānurūpeṇa ca ceṣṭitena /
tgt_original: rūpeṇa cātyantamanohareṇa rūpānurūpeṇa ca ceṣṭitena |

src_original: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5 //
tgt_original: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ ||5 ||

src_original: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaś ca nandaḥ /
tgt_original: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ |

src_original: atītya martyān anupetya devān sṛṣṭāv abhūtām iva bhūtadhātrā // Saund_4.6 //
tgt_original: atītya martyānanupetya devān sṛṣṭāvabhūtāmiva bhūtadhātrā ||6 ||

src_original: tāṃ sundarīṃ cen na labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
tgt_original: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ |

src_original: dvandaṃ dhruvaṃ tad vikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāv iva rātricandrau // Saund_4.7 //
tgt_original: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau ||7 ||

src_original: kandarparatyor iva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyor iva nīḍabhūtam /  praharṣatuṣṭyor iva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam // Saund_4.8 //
tgt_original: kandarparatyoriva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyoriva nīḍabhūtam |  praharṣatuṣṭyoriva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandvaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam ||8 ||

src_original: parasparodvīkṣaṇatatparākṣaṃ parasparavyāhṛtasaktacittam /  parasparāśleṣahṛtāṇgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tan mithunaṃ jahāra // Saund_4.9 //
tgt_original: parasparodvīkṣaṇatatparākṣaṃ parasparavyāhṛtasaktacittam |  parasparāśleṣahṛtāṅgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tanmithunaṃ jahāra ||9 ||

src_original: bhāvānuraktau girinirjharasthau tau kiṃnarīkiṃpuruṣāv ivobhau /
tgt_original: bhāvānuraktau girinirjharasthau tau kinnarīkiṃpuruṣāvivobhau |

src_original: cikrīḍatuś cābhivirejatuś ca rūpaśriyānyonyam ivākṣipantau // Saund_4.10 //  anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena tad dvandvam anyonyam arīramac ca /  klamāntare 'nyonyavinodanena salīlam anyonyam amīmadac ca // Saund_4.11 //
tgt_original: cikrīḍatuścābhivirejatuśca rūpaśriyānyonyamivākṣipantau ||10 ||  anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena taddvandvamanyonyamarīramacca |  klamāntare'nyonyavinodanena salīlamanyonyamamīmadacca ||11 ||

src_original: vibhūṣayām āsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣus tāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
tgt_original: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham |

src_original: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānām api bhuṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
tgt_original: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā ||12 ||

src_original: dattvātha sā darpaṇam asya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvad enam /
tgt_original: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam |

src_original: bhartus tataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṅ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
tgt_original: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk |

src_original: niśvāsavātena ca darpañasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //  sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
tgt_original: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ ||14 ||  sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa |

src_original: bhavec ca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra // Saund_4.15 //  cikṣepa karṇotpalam asya cāṃse kareña savyena madālasena /  pattrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre 'sya tām eva vinirdudhāva // Saund_4.16 //
tgt_original: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena |  patrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre'sya tāmeva vinirdudhāva ||16 ||

src_original: tataś calannūpurayoktritābhyāṃ nakhaprabhodhāsitarāṅgulibhyām /  padhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopamābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayān nāma nanāma nadaḥ // Saund_4.17 //  sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /
tgt_original: tataścalannūpurayoktritābhyāṃ nakhaprabhodbhāsitarāṅgulibhyām |  padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ ||17 ||  sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse |

src_original: suvarṇavedyām anilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārād iva nāgavṛkṣaḥ // Saund_4.18 //
tgt_original: suvarṇavedyāmanilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārādiva nāgavṛkṣaḥ ||18 ||

src_original: sā taṃ stanodvartitahāraṣṭir utthāpayām āsa nipīḍya dorbhyām /
tgt_original: sā taṃ stanodvartitahārayaṣṭirutthāpayāmāsa nipīḍya dorbhyām |

src_original: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccair mukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19 //
tgt_original: kathaṃ kṛto'sīti jahāsa coccairmukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena ||19 ||

src_original: patyus tato darpaṇasaktapāṇer muhurmuhur vaktram avekṣamāṇā /
tgt_original: patyustato darpaṇasaktapāṇermuhurmuhurvaktramavekṣamāṇā |

src_original: tamālapattrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //
tgt_original: tamālapatrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat ||20 ||

src_original: tasyā mukhaṅ tat satamālapattraṅ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /  raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṅ saśaivalaṅ padmam ivābabhāse // Saund_4.21 //
tgt_original: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam |  raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṃ saśaivalaṃ padmamivābabhāse ||21 ||

src_original: nandas tato darpaṇam ādareṇa bibhrat tadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam /  viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
tgt_original: nandastato darpaṇamādareṇa bibhrattadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam |  viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa ||22 ||

src_original: nandaḥ priyāyā mukham īkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23 //
tgt_original: nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva ||23 ||

src_original: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatas tathā caiva nandana nandaḥ /
tgt_original: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ |

src_original: tathāgataś cāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveṣa veśma // Saund_4.24 //
tgt_original: tathāgataścāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveśa veśma ||24 ||

src_original: avāṅmukho niṣpraṇayaś ca tasthau bhrātu gṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
tgt_original: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva |

src_original: tasmād atho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣām alabdhaiva punar jagāma // Saund_4.25 //
tgt_original: tasmādatho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣāmalabdhvaiva punarjagāma ||25 ||

src_original: kā cit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso 'ṅganā kā cid avāsayac ca /  ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthur anyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaś ca // Saund_4.26 //
tgt_original: kācit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso'ṅganā kācidavāsayacca |  ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca ||26 ||

src_original: tasmin gṛhe bhartur ataś carantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /  kāś cin na buddhaṃ dadṛśur yuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṅ manīṣā // Saund_4.27 //  kā cit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
tgt_original: tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam |  kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā ||27 ||

src_original: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhād iva dīptam arkam // Saund_4.28 //
tgt_original: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhādiva dīptamarkam ||28 ||

src_original: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataś ca /
tgt_original: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca |

src_original: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣus tadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29 //
tgt_original: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe ||29 ||

src_original: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gurur gṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ |

src_original: bhikṣām alabdhvā giram āsanaṃ vā sūnyād araṇyād iva yāti bhūyaḥ // Saund_4.30 //
tgt_original: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ ||30 ||

src_original: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥprayāṇam /
tgt_original: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam |

src_original: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrak kalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena // Saund_4.31 //
tgt_original: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrakkalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena ||31 ||

src_original: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
tgt_original: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce |

src_original: kartuṃ gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ mām abhyanujñātum ihārhasīti // Saund_4.32 //
tgt_original: karttu gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ māmabhyanujñātumihārhasīti ||32 ||

src_original: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
tgt_original: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva |

src_original: dadarśa cāśuplutalolanetrā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca // Saund_4.33 //
tgt_original: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco'bhyuvāca ||33 ||

src_original: nāhaṃ yiyāsor gurudarśanārtham arhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām /
tgt_original: nāhaṃ yiyāsorgurudarśanārthamarhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām |

src_original: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghram eva viśeṣako yāvad ayaṅ na śuṣkaḥ // Saund_4.34 //
tgt_original: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ ||34 ||

src_original: saced bhaves tvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇdaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
tgt_original: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam |

src_original: muhurmuhus tvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam // Saund_4.35 //
tgt_original: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam ||35 ||

src_original: athāpy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayy eṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatas tvām /  nipīḍayiṣyāmi bhujadvayena nirbhūṣañenārdravilepanena // Saund_4.36 //
tgt_original: athāpyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayyeṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatastvām |  nipīḍayiṣyāmi bhujadvayena nirbhūṣaṇenārdravilepanena ||36 ||

src_original: ity evam uktaś ca nipīḍitaś ca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda /
tgt_original: ityevamuktaśca nipīḍitaśca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda |

src_original: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gurur dūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37 //
tgt_original: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ ||37 ||

src_original: tataḥ stanodvartitacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
tgt_original: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena |

src_original: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapur babhāra // Saund_4.38 //  sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /  sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntasṃ mṛgaṃ bhrāntaṃ mṛgaṅ bhrāntaṃ mukhī mṛgīva // Saund_4.39 //
tgt_original: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra ||38 ||  sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī |  sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva ||39 ||

src_original: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munes tu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
tgt_original: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca |

src_original: vivṛttadṛṣṭiś ca śanair yayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareñum // Saund_4.40 //  chātodariṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīm ivādreḥ /
tgt_original: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum ||40 ||  chātodarīṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīmivādreḥ |

src_original: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibann ivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa // Saund_4.41//
tgt_original: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa ||41 ||

src_original: taṅ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punar ācakarṣa /
tgt_original: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa |

src_original: sa 'niścayān nāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃs taraṅgeṣv iva rājahaṃsaḥ // Saund_4.42 //  adarśanaṃ tūpagataś ca tasyā harmyāt tataś cāvatatāra tūrṇam /
tgt_original: so'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ ||42 ||

src_original: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punar lalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43 //
tgt_original: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ ||43 ||

src_original: sa kāmarāgeña nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeña ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ |

src_original: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratisrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44 //
tgt_original: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ ||44 ||

src_original: tataḥ kramair dīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kataṃ nu yāto na gurur bhaved iti /
tgt_original: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti |

src_original: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyām ārdraviśeṣakām iti // Saund_4.45 //
tgt_original: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti ||45 ||

src_original: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathāgatābhimānam /
tgt_original: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare'pi tathā gatābhimānam |

src_original: daśabalam abhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajam anuyāna ivaindram arcyamānam // Saund_4.46 //
tgt_original: daśabalamabhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajamanuyāna ivaindramarcyamānam ||46 ||

src_original: Saundaranande mahākāvye bhāryāyācitako nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ /  CANTO V
tgt_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryā-yācitaka“ nāma caturtha sarga samāpta |  pañcamaḥ sargaḥ  nanda-dīkṣā
